channel.title: The Kings of Adiart[Classes Suggestion]
channel.description:
Note: All Kings have their Day Abilities kept in place and the Guard! Night ability
**Good King** - BD Win Condition - *does* kill Butler - No Special Abilities **Evil King** - Unseen Win Condition - *does not* kill Butler - No Special Abilities **Devout King** - Cult Win Condition - *does not* kill Butler - No Special Abilities **Cowardly King** - Survive - *does* kill Butler - No Special Abilities **Mad King** - Fool Win Condition - Immune to Butler - No Kings may be elected if executed(I gave this idea to Plex it isn't stealing from his thingy btw) **Psychopathic King** - NK Win Condition - Immune to Butler - May kill people and disguise the kills as any class to the Physician **Fanatical King** - Mercenary Win Condition - *does not* kill Butler - Becomes Cowardly King if target becomes a dead
*more may come*

item.title: The Kings of Adiart[Classes Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: PokemonKidRyan
item.description:
Might be a bit late to this thread.
But, I love the ideas of so many different kings.
Nice job Jammy.

Read full topic

item.title: The Kings of Adiart[Classes Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
JammySplodge:

Mad King - Fool Win Condition - Immune to Butler - No Kings may be elected if executed(I gave this idea to Plex it isn’t stealing from his thingy btw)

We had the same idea but different names for it.
I had Fool King. I had a different idea for Mad King however.

Either way, it’s a pretty good suggestion.

Read full topic

item.title: The Kings of Adiart[Classes Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: Bounty
item.description:
OH I get what you mean.thought you meant that his goal was to kill the butler.

Read full topic

item.title: The Kings of Adiart[Classes Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: Queen_Alfa
item.description:
Wait, a Merc king poisoned by the Butler, the Butler doesn’t die? I would assume Merc king would make the butler die lel

Read full topic

item.title: The Kings of Adiart[Classes Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Bounty:

Why would the good King kill the butler ? Can you explain ?

“Poison The King’s wine. If The King was part of the Blue Dragon or was a Neutral King, you commit suicide out of guilt.”

http://tol.wikia.com/wiki/The_Butler

Read full topic

item.title: The Kings of Adiart[Classes Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: Bounty
item.description:
Why would the good King kill the butler ? Can you explain ?

Also, what I would like to see in the game is Mad king so butler wouldn’t just randomly want to kill king.

I also agree that there should be more kings implemented because it’s what makes Tol unique.

However I can’t see any of this being implemented soon.

Read full topic

item.title: The Kings of Adiart[Classes Suggestion]
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Note: All Kings have their Day Abilities kept in place and the Guard! Night ability

Good King - BD Win Condition - does kill Butler - No Special Abilities
Evil King - Unseen Win Condition - does not kill Butler - No Special Abilities
Devout King - Cult Win Condition - does not kill Butler - No Special Abilities
Cowardly King - Survive - does kill Butler - No Special Abilities
Mad King - Fool Win Condition - Immune to Butler - No Kings may be elected if executed(I gave this idea to Plex it isn’t stealing from his thingy btw)
Psychopathic King - NK Win Condition - Immune to Butler - May kill people and disguise the kills as any class to the Physician
Fanatical King - Mercenary Win Condition - does not kill Butler - Becomes Cowardly King if target becomes a dead

more may come

Read full topic
